name: South Place Hotel
description: Located where the sophisticated City of London meets the Cultural East End, Liverpool Street and Moorgate Station are on their doorstep; the West End is ten minutes away by tube. Their 80 bedrooms, four bars,five private dining rooms and two restaurants are all iconic Conran design.

name: The Montcalm
description: Situated in the heart of The City of London; this exceptional grade II listed building has been stunningly restored into a luxury five star hotel. Conveniently located near Barbican and Moorgate stations and easily accessible from Liverpool Street station.

name: Malmaison
description: Located on the edge of Clerkenwell in West Smithfield, this is one of the most stylish and conveniently located hotels in Central London. Bathed in natural light and lively with an understated 1970s vibe.

name: Travelodge
description: Conveniently close to several transport links, this picturesque hotel is located in the heart of London and is within easy reach of some of London’s best attractions such as the West End which is famous for its shopping, restaurants and theatres.
